languages.text: {n}Обступив меня, они угрожают, тычут пальцами, проклинают. Не бьют — пока что... Но они давят своей чудовищной массой, и запах крови в воздухе становится все гуще.{/n}

{n}They surround me, threatening, pointing fingers, cursing. They dare not strike, not yet... But already their enormous bulk presses down upon me as the smell of blood in the air grows thicker by the minute.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Обступив меня, они угрожают, тычут пальцами, проклинают. Не бьют — пока что... Но они давят своей чудовищной массой, и запах крови в воздухе становится все гуще.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}They circle around me, threatening, pointing fingers, and cursing. They dare not strike, not yet... But they press down with their enormous bulk, and the smell of blood in the air grows thicker by the minute.{/n}

{n}They surround me, threatening, pointing fingers, cursing. They dare not strike, not yet... But already their enormous bulk presses down upon me as the smell of blood in the air grows thicker by the minute.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sie umzingeln mich, drohen, zeigen mit den Fingern, fluchen. Sie wagen es nicht, zuzuschlagen, noch nicht ... Aber ihre enorme Masse erdrückt mich jetzt schon fast, während der Geruch von Blut in der Luft minütlich stärker wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They surround me, threatening, pointing fingers, cursing. They dare not strike, not yet... But already their enormous bulk presses down upon me as the smell of blood in the air grows thicker by the minute.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie umzingeln mich, drohen, zeigen mit den Fingern, fluchen. Sie wagen es nicht, zuzuschlagen, noch nicht ... Aber ihre enorme Masse erdrückt mich jetzt schon fast, während der Geruch von Blut in der Luft minütlich stärker wird.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Me rodean, amenazando, señalando, maldiciendo. No se atreven a golpear, aún no... pero su inmensa masa me empuja, y el olor de la sangre en el aire se vuelve más fuerte con cada minuto.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They surround me, threatening, pointing fingers, cursing. They dare not strike, not yet... But already their enormous bulk presses down upon me as the smell of blood in the air grows thicker by the minute.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Me rodean, amenazando, señalando, maldiciendo. No se atreven a golpear, aún no... pero su inmensa masa me empuja, y el olor de la sangre en el aire se vuelve más fuerte con cada minuto.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼らは私を取り囲んで凄み、指を指して罵る。まだ攻撃する勇気はないようだが…すでに彼らの巨体は私を圧迫して、空気中の血のにおいは、どんどん濃くなっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They surround me, threatening, pointing fingers, cursing. They dare not strike, not yet... But already their enormous bulk presses down upon me as the smell of blood in the air grows thicker by the minute.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼らは私を取り囲んで凄み、指を指して罵る。まだ攻撃する勇気はないようだが…すでに彼らの巨体は私を圧迫して、空気中の血のにおいは、どんどん濃くなっている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}他们围住了我，威胁我，对我指手画脚，咒骂我。他们不敢发起攻击，现在还不敢……但他们硕大的身躯马上就要压在我的身上，空气中血腥的味道每分每秒都变得更加浓烈。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They surround me, threatening, pointing fingers, cursing. They dare not strike, not yet... But already their enormous bulk presses down upon me as the smell of blood in the air grows thicker by the minute.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他们围住了我，威胁我，对我指手画脚，咒骂我。他们不敢发起攻击，现在还不敢……但他们硕大的身躯马上就要压在我的身上，空气中血腥的味道每分每秒都变得更加浓烈。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ils m'entourent, me menacent, me montrent du doigt, me maudissent. Ils n'osent portant pas me frapper... pas encore. Mais leur masse énorme m'écrase tandis que l'odeur du sang se fait plus prégnante à chaque minute qui s'écoule.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They surround me, threatening, pointing fingers, cursing. They dare not strike, not yet... But already their enormous bulk presses down upon me as the smell of blood in the air grows thicker by the minute.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tehdit savurarak, hedef göstererek, lanet yağdırarak etrafımı sarıyorlar. Saldırıya geçmeye kalkışamazlar, henüz değil... Fakat havadaki kan kokusu her dakika daha da yoğunlaşırken beni devasa cüsseleriyle hâlihazırda köşeye sıkıştırdılar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They surround me, threatening, pointing fingers, cursing. They dare not strike, not yet... But already their enormous bulk presses down upon me as the smell of blood in the air grows thicker by the minute.{/n}
